# lakefs_branch (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "lakefs_branch" "develop" {
  repository = lakefs_repository.example.id
  name       = "develop"
  source     = "main"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the branch
- `source` (String) Source reference to create the branch from

### Optional

- `branch` (String)
- `force` (Boolean)
- `hidden` (Boolean) When set, branch will not show up when listing branches by default. *EXPERIMENTAL*
- `repository` (String)

### Read-Only

- `commit_id` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
